 module B(
   input wire [7:0] x,
   input wire [7:0] y,
   output wire [7:0] out
 );

-  wire [7:0] b;
-  wire [7:0] r;
-  assign a = x & x;
-  assign b = y | y;
-  assign r = a + b;
